channel.title: Designs on Hugo Whisper Theme
channel.description: Recent content in Designs on Hugo Whisper Theme

item.title: Storage class support in Ozone
item.description: Abstract One of the fundamental abstraction of Ozone is the Container which used as the unit of the replication. Containers have to favors: Open and Closed containers: Open containers are replicated by Ratis and writable, Closed containers are replicated with data copy and read only.
